title: Introduction to TABASCO PEPPER: Plant Profile! (Capsicum frutescens)

subtasks: Recognizing the unique characteristics of Tabasco peppers (juicy fruits, flavor, heat profile)
Identifying optimal growing conditions (climate, soil, pH)
Learning the planting process (seeds, germination, spacing)
Monitoring and caring for the plants (sunlight, watering, companions planting)
Harvesting and using Tabasco peppers (culinary and medicinal uses)
